name: get_emergency_responders_info
description: Get information of the emergency responders.

name: adjust_stress_level
description: Modify the stress levels of the responders based on the simulated environment.

new_stress_level.description: The target stress level to simulate changes in the environment (e.g., 80).

name: simulate_stress_scenario
description: Executes a stress-inducing scenario with specific settings for a participant.

scenario_title.description: The title of the stress scenario to simulate.

participant_name.description: The name of the participant involved in the scenario.

name: check_patient_info
description: Check the infomation of the patients.
